info.title: bunny.net API
info.description:
Learn how to use the [bunny.net](https://bunny.net "bunny.net - The content delivery platform that truly hops.") API. Everything that can be done with the control panel can also be achieved with our API documented on this page. To learn how to use the storage API, have a look at our storage API documentation

Third party API clients:


We currently do not maintain an official API library, but you can use one of the third party ones provided here:

https://github.com/codewithmark/bunnycdn (bunny.net PHP library, thanks to Code With Mark)

Note that third party clients are not maintained or developed by bunny.net so we unfortunately cannot offer support for them.

200.description: The statistics data for the passed parameters.
The list of all API keys on the account

Hostname.description: The hostname that will be added

AddHostnameRequestModel.description: The model used for adding new hostnames to a pull zone

LoggingIPAnonymizationEnabled.description: Determines if the TLS 1 is enabled on the DNS Zone

LogAnonymizationType.description: Sets the log anonymization type for this zone

DnsSecEnabled.description: Determines if DNSSEC is enabled for this DNS Zone

CertificateKeyType.description: The private key type to use for automatic certificates

LogAnonymizationType.description: Gets the log anonymization type for this zone

CertificateKeyType.description: Sets the certificate private key type for wildcard certificates for this zone

LoggingIPAnonymizationEnabled.description: Determines if the log anonoymization should be enabled

ReplicationZones.description: The list of replication zones enabld for the storage zone

OriginUrl.description: The origin URL of the storage zone

Custom404FilePath.description: The path to the custom file that will be returned in a case of 404

Rewrite404To200.description: Rewrite 404 status code to 200 for URLs without extension

TriggerTypes.description:
0 = Url
1 = RequestHeader
2 = ResponseHeader
3 = UrlExtension
4 = CountryCode
5 = RemoteIP
6 = UrlQueryString
7 = RandomChance
8 = StatusCode
9 = RequestMethod
10 = CookieValue
11 = CountryStateCode
12 = OriginRetryAttemptCount
13 = OriginConnectionError

Hostname.description: The hostname that will be added as a blocked referer

AddBlockedReferrerRequestModel.description: The model used for adding new blocked referer hostnames

Hostname.description: The hostname that will be removed

RemoveHostnameRequestModel.description: The model used for adding new hostnames to a pull zone

Hostname.description: The hostname to which the hostname will be added

Certificate.description: The Base64 encoded binary data of the certificate file

CertificateKey.description: The Base64 encoded binary data of the certificate key file

AddCertificateRequestModel.description: The model used for adding new hostnames to a pull zone

RequestsRetriedChart.description: The constructed chart of requests retried

RequestsSavedChart.description: The constructed chart of requests saved

TotalRequestsRetried.description: The total number of retried requests

TotalRequestsSaved.description: The total number of saved requests

Hostname.description: The hostname from which the certificate will be removed

RemoveCertificateRequestModel.description: The model used for removing an existing certificate from the given pull zone hostname

Name.description: The name of the optimizer class that will be used in the query string

Properties.description: The list of settings and values the class will send to the optimizer

BlockedIp.description: The IP that will be removed fromt he block list

RemoveBlockedIpRequestModel.description: The model used for removing blocked Ips

OptimizerWatermarkPosition.description:
0 = BottomLeft
1 = BottomRight
2 = TopLeft
3 = TopRight
4 = Center
5 = CenterStretch

Hostname.description: The hostname that will be updated

ForceSSL.description: Set to true to force SSL on the given pull zone hostname

ForceSSLRequestModel.description: The model used for setting the Force SSL setting

Domain.description: The domain that will be added.

VideoCount.description: The number of videos in the video library

TrafficUsage.description: The amount of traffic usage this month

StorageUsage.description: The total amount of storage used by the library

DateCreated.description: The date when the video library was created

ReplicationRegions.description: The geo-replication regions of the underlying storage zone

ApiKey.description: The API key used for authenticating with the video library

ReadOnlyApiKey.description: The read-only API key used for authenticating with the video library

HasWatermark.description: Determines if the video library has a watermark configured

WatermarkPositionLeft.description: The left offset of the watermark position (in %)

WatermarkPositionTop.description: The top offset of the watermark position (in %)

PullZoneId.description: The ID of the connected underlying pull zone

StorageZoneId.description: The ID of the connected underlying storage zone

EnabledResolutions.description: The comma separated list of enabled resolutions

ViAiPublisherId.description: The vi.ai publisher id for advertising configuration

VastTagUrl.description: The URL of the VAST tag endpoint for advertising configuration

WebhookUrl.description: The webhook URL of the video library

UILanguage.description: The UI language of the player

AllowEarlyPlay.description: Determines if the Early-Play feature is enabled

PlayerTokenAuthenticationEnabled.description: Determines if the player token authentication is enabled

AllowedReferrers.description: The list of allowed referrer domains allowed to access the library

BlockedReferrers.description: The list of blocked referrer domains blocked from accessing the library

BlockNoneReferrer.description: Determines if the requests without a referrer are blocked

EnableMP4Fallback.description: Determines if the MP4 fallback feature is enabled

KeepOriginalFiles.description: Determines if the original video files should be stored after encoding

AllowDirectPlay.description: Determines direct play URLs are enabled for the library

EnableDRM.description: Determines if the DRM is enabled

Bitrate240p.description: The bitrate used for encoding 240p videos

Bitrate360p.description: The bitrate used for encoding 360p videos

Bitrate480p.description: The bitrate used for encoding 480p videos

Bitrate720p.description: The bitrate used for encoding 720p videos

Bitrate1080p.description: The bitrate used for encoding 1080p videos

Bitrate1440p.description: The bitrate used for encoding 1440p videos

Bitrate2160p.description: The bitrate used for encoding 2160p videos

ApiAccessKey.description: The API access key for the library. Only added when the includeAccessKey parameter is set.

ShowHeatmap.description: Determines if the video watch heatmap should be displayed in the player.

EnableContentTagging.description: Determines if content tagging should be enabled for this library.

PullZoneType.description: The type of the pull zone attached. Premium = 0, Volume = 1

CustomHTML.description: The custom HTMl that is added into the head of the HTML player.

Controls.description: The list of controls on the video player.

PlaybackSpeeds.description: The list of playback speeds available in the video player.

PlayerKeyColor.description: The key color of the player.

EnableTranscribing.description: Determines if the automatic audio transcribing is currently enabled for this zone.

EnableTranscribingTitleGeneration.description: Determines if automatic transcribing title generation is currently enabled.

EnableTranscribingDescriptionGeneration.description: Determines if automatic transcribing description generation is currently enabled.

TranscribingCaptionLanguages.description: The list of languages that the captions will be automatically transcribed to.

RememberPlayerPosition.description: Determines if the player will automatically remember the playback position.

EnableMultiAudioTrackSupport.description: Determines if multiple output audio track support is enabled on video library.

UseSeparateAudioStream.description: Determines whether output audio stream should be split from video stream segments.

JitEncodingEnabled.description: Determines whether JIT encoding should be used for the library. Supported in premium encoding only.

EncodingTier.description: Defines encoding tier to be used with video library. premium is a paid tier that offers either JIT encoding or prioritized encoding and extra codec support.

OutputCodecs.description: Specifies which video codecs are used for encoding, provided as a comma-separated (CSV) string. Free encoding tier supports only x264. A premium encoding tier adds support for vp9, hevc, and av1.

DrmBasePriceOverride.description: DRM (enterprise) monthly base price for this video library if it differs from list price.

DrmCostPerLicenseOverride.description: DRM (enterprise) cost per license for this video library if it differs from list price.

RemoveMetadataFromFallbackVideos.description: Marks whether all potential video metadata should be removed from the fallback files. Default false.

ScaleVideoUsingBothDimensions.description: Marks whether videos should be scaled using both dimensions. Prevents videos being upscaled or unexpected aspect ratio changes. Default true.

ReplicationRegions.description: The geo-replication regions of the underlying storage zone

PlayerVersion.description: (Optional) Sets player version used for this library

Id.description: The unique id of the user

FirstName.description: The first name of the user

LastName.description: The last name of the user

DateJoined.description: The date when the user joined bunny.net

EmailVerified.description: Determines if the account's email has been successfuly verified

Roles.description: Determines the roles that the user belongs to

TwoFactorAuthenticationEnabled.description: Determines if the user has active 2FA configuration

Name.description: The name of the storage zone

Region.description: The code of the main storage zone region (Possible values: DE, NY, LA, SG)

ReplicationRegions.description: The code of the main storage zone region (Possible values: DE, NY, LA, SG, SYD)

ZoneTier.description: Determines the storage zone tier that will be storing the data

StorageZoneType.description: The Storage Zone S3 support type

OriginUrl.description: Sets the origin URL of the Pull Zone

AllowedReferrers.description: Sets the list of referrer hostnames that are allowed to access the pull zone. Requests containing the header Referer: hostname that is not on the list will be rejected. If empty, all the referrers are allowed

BlockedReferrers.description: Sets the list of referrer hostnames that are blocked from accessing the pull zone.

BlockedIps.description: Sets the list of IPs that are blocked from accessing the pull zone. Requests coming from the following IPs will be rejected. If empty, all the IPs will be allowed

EnableGeoZoneUS.description: Determines if the delivery from the North America region should be enabled for this pull zone

EnableGeoZoneEU.description: Determines if the delivery from the Europe region should be enabled for this pull zone

EnableGeoZoneASIA.description: Determines if the delivery from the Asia / Oceania regions should be enabled for this pull zone

EnableGeoZoneSA.description: Determines if the delivery from the South America region should be enabled for this pull zone

EnableGeoZoneAF.description: Determines if the delivery from the Africa region should be enabled for this pull zone

BlockRootPathAccess.description: Determines if the zone should block requests to the root of the zone.

BlockPostRequests.description: Determines if the POST requests to this zone should be rejected.

EnableQueryStringOrdering.description: Determines if the query string ordering should be enabled.

EnableWebpVary.description: Determines if the WebP Vary feature should be enabled.

EnableAvifVary.description: Determines if the AVIF Vary feature should be enabled.

EnableMobileVary.description: Determines if the Mobile Vary feature is enabled.

EnableCountryCodeVary.description: Determines if the Country Code Vary feature should be enabled.

EnableCountryStateCodeVary.description: Determines if the Country State Code Vary feature should be enabled.

EnableHostnameVary.description: Determines if the Hostname Vary feature should be enabled.

EnableCacheSlice.description: Determines if cache slicing (Optimize for video) should be enabled for this zone

ZoneSecurityEnabled.description: Determines if the zone token authentication security should be enabled

ZoneSecurityIncludeHashRemoteIP.description: Determines if the token authentication IP validation should be enabled

IgnoreQueryStrings.description: Determines if the Pull Zone should ignore query strings when serving cached objects (Vary by Query String)

MonthlyBandwidthLimit.description: Sets the monthly limit of bandwidth in bytes that the pullzone is allowed to use

AccessControlOriginHeaderExtensions.description: Sets the list of extensions that will return the CORS headers

EnableAccessControlOriginHeader.description: Determines if CORS headers should be enabled

DisableCookies.description: Determines if the Pull Zone should automatically remove cookies from the responses

BudgetRedirectedCountries.description: Sets the list of two letter Alpha2 country codes that will be redirected to the cheapest possible region

BlockedCountries.description: Sets the list of two letter Alpha2 country codes that will be blocked from accessing the zone

CacheControlMaxAgeOverride.description: Sets the cache control override setting for this zone

CacheControlPublicMaxAgeOverride.description: Sets the browser cache control override setting for this zone

CacheControlBrowserMaxAgeOverride.description: (Deprecated) Sets the browser cache control override setting for this zone

AddHostHeader.description: Determines if the zone should forward the requested host header to the origin

AddCanonicalHeader.description: Determines if the canonical header should be added by this zone

EnableLogging.description: Determines if the logging should be enabled for this zone

LoggingIPAnonymizationEnabled.description: Determines if the log anonoymization should be enabled

PermaCacheStorageZoneId.description: The ID of the storage zone that should be used as the Perma-Cache

AWSSigningEnabled.description: Determines if the AWS signing should be enabled or not

AWSSigningRegionName.description: Sets the AWS signing region name

AWSSigningSecret.description: Sets the AWS signing secret key

EnableOriginShield.description: Determines if the origin shield should be enabled

OriginShieldZoneCode.description: Determines the zone code where the origin shield should be set up

EnableTLS1.description: Determines if the TLS 1 should be enabled on this zone

EnableTLS1_1.description: Determines if the TLS 1.1 should be enabled on this zone

CacheErrorResponses.description: Determines if the cache error responses should be enabled on the zone

VerifyOriginSSL.description: Determines if the SSL certificate should be verified when connecting to the origin

LogForwardingEnabled.description: Sets the log forwarding token for the zone

LogForwardingHostname.description: Sets the log forwarding destination hostname for the zone

LogForwardingPort.description: Sets the log forwarding port for the zone

LogForwardingToken.description: Sets the log forwarding token for the zone

LogForwardingProtocol.description: Sets the log forwarding protocol type

LoggingSaveToStorage.description: Determines if the logging permanent storage should be enabled

LoggingStorageZoneId.description: Sets the Storage Zone id that should contain the logs from this Pull Zone

FollowRedirects.description: Determines if the zone should follow redirects return by the oprigin and cache the response

ConnectionLimitPerIPCount.description: Determines the maximum number of connections per IP that will be allowed to connect to this Pull Zone

RequestLimit.description: Determines the maximum number of requests per second that will be allowed to connect to this Pull Zone

LimitRateAfter.description: Determines the amount of traffic transferred before the client is limited

LimitRatePerSecond.description: Determines the maximum number of requests per second coming from a single IP before it is blocked.

BurstSize.description: Determines the maximum burst requests before an IP is blocked

ErrorPageEnableCustomCode.description: Determines if custom error page code should be enabled.

ErrorPageCustomCode.description: Contains the custom error page code that will be returned

ErrorPageEnableStatuspageWidget.description: Determines if the statuspage widget should be displayed on the error pages

ErrorPageStatuspageCode.description: The statuspage code that will be used to build the status widget

ErrorPageWhitelabel.description: Determines if the error pages should be whitelabel or not

OptimizerEnabled.description: Determines if the optimizer should be enabled for this zone

OptimizerTunnelEnabled.description: Determines if the optimizer origin tunnel system should be enabled for this zone

OptimizerDesktopMaxWidth.description: Determines the maximum automatic image size for desktop clients

OptimizerMobileMaxWidth.description: Determines the maximum automatic image size for mobile clients

OptimizerImageQuality.description: Determines the image quality for desktop clients

OptimizerMobileImageQuality.description: Determines the image quality for mobile clients

OptimizerEnableWebP.description: Determines if the WebP optimization should be enabled

OptimizerPrerenderHtml.description: Determines if the SEO HTML prerender should be enabled

OptimizerEnableManipulationEngine.description: Determines the image manipulation should be enabled

OptimizerMinifyCSS.description: Determines if the CSS minifcation should be enabled

OptimizerMinifyJavaScript.description: Determines if the JavaScript minifcation should be enabled

OptimizerWatermarkEnabled.description: Determines if image watermarking should be enabled

OptimizerWatermarkUrl.description: Sets the URL of the watermark image

OptimizerWatermarkPosition.description: Sets the position of the watermark image

OptimizerWatermarkOffset.description: Sets the offset of the watermark image

OptimizerWatermarkMinImageSize.description: Sets the minimum image size to which the watermark will be added

OptimizerAutomaticOptimizationEnabled.description: Determines if the automatic image optimization should be enabled

OptimizerClasses.description: Determines the list of optimizer classes

OptimizerForceClasses.description: Determines if the optimizer classes should be forced

OptimizerStaticHtmlWordPressPath.description: Wordpress html path which should be bypassed by permacache in edge rule

OptimizerStaticHtmlWordPressBypassCookie.description: Wordpress cookie which should be bypassed by permacache in edge rule

Type.description: The type of the pull zone. Premium = 0, Volume = 1

OriginRetries.description: The number of retries to the origin server

OriginConnectTimeout.description: The amount of seconds to wait when connecting to the origin. Otherwise the request will fail or retry.

OriginResponseTimeout.description: The amount of seconds to wait when waiting for the origin reply. Otherwise the request will fail or retry.

UseStaleWhileUpdating.description: Determines if we should use stale cache while cache is updating

UseStaleWhileOffline.description: Determines if we should use stale cache while the origin is offline

OriginRetry5XXResponses.description: Determines if we should retry the request in case of a 5XX response.

OriginRetryConnectionTimeout.description: Determines if we should retry the request in case of a connection timeout.

OriginRetryResponseTimeout.description: Determines if we should retry the request in case of a response timeout.

OriginRetryDelay.description: Determines the amount of time that the CDN should wait before retrying an origin request.

DnsOriginPort.description: Determines the origin port of the pull zone.

DnsOriginScheme.description: Determines the origin scheme of the pull zone.

OriginShieldEnableConcurrencyLimit.description: Determines if the origin shield concurrency limit is enabled.

OriginShieldMaxConcurrentRequests.description: Determines the number of maximum concurrent requests allowed to the origin.

EnableCookieVary.description: Determines if the Cookie Vary feature is enabled.

OriginShieldQueueMaxWaitTime.description: Determines the max queue wait time

OriginShieldMaxQueuedRequests.description: Determines the max number of origin requests that will remain in the queue

UseBackgroundUpdate.description: Determines if cache update is performed in the background.

EnableAutoSSL.description: If set to true, any hostnames added to this Pull Zone will automatically enable SSL.

LogAnonymizationType.description: Sets the log anonymization type for this pull zone

StorageZoneId.description: The ID of the storage zone that will be used as the origin

EdgeScriptId.description: The ID of the edge script that will be used as the origin

MiddlewareScriptId.description: The ID of the middleware script

EdgeScriptExecutionPhase.description: The execution phase of the edge script

OriginType.description: Determine the type of the origin for this Pull Zone

OriginHostHeader.description: Sets the host header that will be sent to the origin

EnableRequestCoalescing.description: Determines if request coalescing is currently enabled.

RequestCoalescingTimeout.description: Determines the lock time for coalesced requests.

DisableLetsEncrypt.description: If set to true, the built-in let's encrypt will be disabled and requests are passed to the origin.

PreloadingScreenEnabled.description: Determines if the preloading screen is currently enabled

PreloadingScreenShowOnFirstVisit.description: Determines if the preloading screen is shown on the first load from a user.

PreloadingScreenTheme.description: The currently configured preloading screem theme. (0 - Light, 1 - Dark)

PreloadingScreenCodeEnabled.description: Determines if the custom preloader screen should be enabled

PreloadingScreenDelay.description: The delay in miliseconds after which the preloading screen will be displayed (0 - 10000ms)

RoutingFilters.description: The list of routing filters enabled for this zone

StickySessionType.description: Whether to use a Sticky Session mechanism for this pull zone

StickySessionClientHeaders.description: A set of comma-separated header names used to identify clients

OptimizerEnableUpscaling.description: Determines if Optimizer should automatically upscale images

EnableWebSockets.description: Determines if WebSocket connections are allowed for this Pull Zone.

StorageUsedChart.description: The constructed chart of the storage used by day

FileCountChart.description: The constructed chart of requests stored

CountryCode.description: The ISO country code of the location

Country.description: The name of the country of the location

ASN.description: The ASN of the IP organization

OrganizationName.description: The mame of the organization that owns the IP

City.description: The name of the city of the location

GeoDnsLocationModel.description: Billing model contains data summary about the user's billing

ToggleRequestModel.description: ToggleRequestModel is used for toggle switches and contains an ID and on/off value

Name.description: Determines the name of the zone that we are checking

Id.description: The unique ID of the region

Name.description: The display name of the region

PricePerGigabyte.description: The traffic pricing per gigabyte for the region

ContinentCode.description: The continent code of the region

CountryCode.description: The country code of the region

Latitude.description: The latitude coordinate for this region

Longitude.description: The longitude coordinate for this region

AllowLatencyRouting.description: Determines weather this region can be selected as a DNS latency routing region

Name.description: (Optional) Sets name of the video library

CustomHTML.description: (Optional) Sets the player custom HTML code

PlayerKeyColor.description: (Optional) Sets the player key control color

EnableTokenAuthentication.description: (Optional) Determines if the token authentication should be enabled

EnableTokenIPVerification.description: (Optional) Determines if the token IP verification should be enabled

ResetToken.description: (Optional) Set to true to reset the CDN and embed view token key

WatermarkPositionLeft.description: (Optional) Sets the left offset of the watermark position (in %)

WatermarkPositionTop.description: (Optional) Sets the top offset of the watermark position (in %)

WatermarkWidth.description: (Optional) Sets the width of the watermark (in %)

WatermarkHeight.description: (Optional) Sets the height of the watermark (in %)

EnabledResolutions.description: (Optional) Sets the enabled resolutions for the transcoding. At least one resolution should be enabled. Possible values: 240p, 360p, 480p, 720p, 1080p, 1440p, 2160p

CaptionsFontSize.description: (Optional) Sets the captions display font size

CaptionsFontColor.description: (Optional) Sets the captions display font color

CaptionsBackground.description: (Optional) Sets the captions display background color

UILanguage.description: (Optional) Sets the UI language of the video player.

AllowEarlyPlay.description: (Optional) Determines if the Early-Play feature should be enabled.

PlayerTokenAuthenticationEnabled.description: (Optional) Determines if the token authentication should be enabled.

BlockNoneReferrer.description: (Optional) Determines if requests without a referer should be blocked.

EnableMP4Fallback.description: (Optional) Determines if MP4 fallback should be enabled for this library.

KeepOriginalFiles.description: (Optional) Determines if the original file should be kept after the video is processed.

AllowDirectPlay.description: (Optional) Determines if direct play URLs should be enabled for the library

EnableDRM.description: (Optional) Determines if MediaCage basic DRM should be enabled for this library

Controls.description: (Optional) The comma separated list of controls that will be displayed in the video player. Possible values: play-large, play, progress, current-time, mute, volume, captions, settings, pip, airplay, fullscreen.

Bitrate240p.description: (Optional) The bitrate used for encoding 240p videos

Bitrate360p.description: (Optional) The bitrate used for encoding 360p videos

Bitrate480p.description: (Optional) The bitrate used for encoding 480p videos

Bitrate720p.description: (Optional) The bitrate used for encoding 720p videos

Bitrate1080p.description: (Optional) The bitrate used for encoding 1080p videos

Bitrate1440p.description: (Optional) The bitrate used for encoding 1440p videos

Bitrate2160p.description: (Optional) The bitrate used for encoding 2160p videos

ShowHeatmap.description: Determines if the video watch heatmap should be displayed in the player.

EnableContentTagging.description: Determines if content tagging should be enabled for this library.

EnableTranscribing.description: (Optional) Determines if the automatic audio transcribing is currently enabled for this zone.

EnableTranscribingTitleGeneration.description: (Optional) Determines if automatic transcribing title generation is currently enabled.

EnableTranscribingDescriptionGeneration.description: (Optional) Determines if automatic transcribing description generation is currently enabled.

TranscribingCaptionLanguages.description: (Optional) The list of languages that the captions will be automatically transcribed to.

DrmVersion.description: (Optional) Determines MediaCage DRM version to be used for this library

PlaybackSpeeds.description: (Optional) The comma separated list of playback speeds that will be available in the video player. Possible values: 0.25,0.5,0.75,1.0,1.25,1.5,1.75,2.0,2.5,3,3.5,4

EnableTranscribingChaptersGeneration.description: (Optional) Determines if automatic transcribing chapters generation is currently enabled.

EnableTranscribingMomentsGeneration.description: (Optional) Determines if automatic transcribing moments generation is currently enabled.

EnableCaptionsInPlaylist.description: (Optional) Determines if any associated captions will be automatically signaled in the HLS master playlist via EXT-X-MEDIA tags, allowing client players to show captions.

RememberPlayerPosition.description: (Optional) Determines if the player will automatically remember the playback position.

EnableMultiAudioTrackSupport.description: (Optional) Determines if multiple output audio track support is enabled on video library.

UseSeparateAudioStream.description: (Optional) Determines whether output audio stream should be split from video stream segments.

JitEncodingEnabled.description: (Optional) Determines whether JIT encoding should be used for the library. Supported in premium encoding only.

EncodingTier.description: (Optional) Defines encoding tier to be used with video library. premium is a paid tier that offers either JIT encoding or prioritized encoding and extra codec support.

OutputCodecs.description: (Optional) Specifies which video codecs are used for encoding, provided as a comma-separated (CSV) string. Free encoding tier supports only x264. A premium encoding tier adds support for vp9, hevc, and av1.

AppleFairPlayDrm.description: (Optional) Configure Apple FairPlay DRM. Works only if Enterprise DRM is set up.

Enabled.description: (Optional) Enables or disables Apple FairPlay Enterprise DRM

GoogleWidevineDrm.description: (Optional) Configure Google Widevine DRM. Works only if Enterprise DRM is set up.

Enabled.description: (Optional) Enables or disables Google Widevine Enterprise DRM

SdOnlyForL3.description: (Optional) Only allow audio and SD access to Widevine L3 clients

MinClientSecurityLevel.description: (Optional) Minimum Client Security Level (1 being most secure, 3 least secure and is default)

PlayerVersion.description: (Optional) Sets player version used for this library

RemoveMetadataFromFallbackVideos.description: (Optional) Marks whether all potential video metadata should be removed from the fallback files

ScaleVideoUsingBothDimensions.description: (Optional) Marks whether videos should be scaled using both dimensions. Prevents videos being upscaled or unexpected aspect ratio changes.

Id.description: The unique ID of the pull zone.

Name.description: The name of the pull zone.

OriginUrl.description: The origin URL of the pull zone where the files are fetched from.

Enabled.description: True unless reached resource limits or account owning it ran out of funds.

Hostnames.description: The list of hostnames linked to this Pull Zone

StorageZoneId.description: The ID of the storage zone that the pull zone is linked to

EdgeScriptId.description: The ID of the edge script that the pull zone is linked to

EdgeScriptExecutionPhase.description: The phase of the request where the script will be executed

MagicContainersAppId.description: The ID of the Magic Container application the pull zone is linked to

MagicContainersEndpointId.description: The ID of the Magic Container Endpoint the pull zone is linked to

AllowedReferrers.description: The list of referrer hostnames that are allowed to access the pull zone.Requests containing the header Referer: hostname that is not on the list will be rejected.If empty, all the referrers are allowed

BlockedReferrers.description: The list of referrer hostnames that are allowed to access the pull zone. Requests containing the header Referer: hostname that is not on the list will be rejected. If empty, all the referrers are allowed

BlockedIps.description: The list of IPs that are blocked from accessing the pull zone. Requests coming from the following IPs will be rejected. If empty, all the IPs will be allowed

EnableGeoZoneUS.description: Determines if the delivery from the North American region is enabled for this pull zone

EnableGeoZoneEU.description: Determines if the delivery from the European region is enabled for this pull zone

EnableGeoZoneASIA.description: Determines if the delivery from the Asian / Oceanian region is enabled for this pull zone

EnableGeoZoneSA.description: Determines if the delivery from the South American region is enabled for this pull zone

EnableGeoZoneAF.description: Determines if the delivery from the Africa region is enabled for this pull zone

ZoneSecurityEnabled.description: True if the URL secure token authentication security is enabled

ZoneSecurityKey.description: The security key used for secure URL token authentication

ZoneSecurityIncludeHashRemoteIP.description: True if the zone security hash should include the remote IP

IgnoreQueryStrings.description: True if the Pull Zone is ignoring query strings when serving cached objects

MonthlyBandwidthLimit.description: The monthly limit of bandwidth in bytes that the pullzone is allowed to use

MonthlyBandwidthUsed.description: The amount of bandwidth in bytes that the pull zone used this month

MonthlyCharges.description: The total monthly charges for this so zone so far

AddHostHeader.description: Determines if the Pull Zone should forward the current hostname to the origin

OriginHostHeader.description: Determines the host header that will be sent to the origin

Type.description: The type of the pull zone. Premium = 0, Volume = 1

AccessControlOriginHeaderExtensions.description: The list of extensions that will return the CORS headers

EnableAccessControlOriginHeader.description: Determines if the CORS headers should be enabled

DisableCookies.description: Determines if the cookies are disabled for the pull zone

BudgetRedirectedCountries.description: The list of budget redirected countries with the two-letter Alpha2 ISO codes

BlockedCountries.description: The list of blocked countries with the two-letter Alpha2 ISO codes

EnableOriginShield.description: If true the server will use the origin shield feature

CacheControlMaxAgeOverride.description: The override cache time for the pull zone

CacheControlPublicMaxAgeOverride.description: The override cache time for the pull zone for the end client

BurstSize.description: Excessive requests are delayed until their number exceeds the maximum burst size.

RequestLimit.description: Max number of requests per IP per second

BlockRootPathAccess.description: If true, access to root path will return a 403 error

BlockPostRequests.description: If true, POST requests to the zone will be blocked

LimitRatePerSecond.description: The maximum rate at which the zone will transfer data in kb/s. 0 for unlimited

LimitRateAfter.description: The amount of data after the rate limit will be activated

ConnectionLimitPerIPCount.description: The number of connections limited per IP for this zone

PriceOverride.description: The custom price override for this zone. Unit is $/Byte.

OptimizerPricing.description: Monthly pricing for Bunny Optimizer for this pull zone

AddCanonicalHeader.description: Determines if the Add Canonical Header is enabled for this Pull Zone

EnableLogging.description: Determines if the logging is enabled for this Pull Zone

EnableCacheSlice.description: Determines if the cache slice (Optimize for video) feature is enabled for the Pull Zone

EnableSmartCache.description: Determines if smart caching is enabled for this zone

EdgeRules.description: The list of edge rules on this Pull Zone

EnableWebPVary.description: Determines if the WebP Vary feature is enabled.

EnableAvifVary.description: Determines if the AVIF Vary feature is enabled.

EnableCountryCodeVary.description: Determines if the Country Code Vary feature is enabled.

EnableCountryStateCodeVary.description: Determines if the Country State Code Vary feature should be enabled.

EnableMobileVary.description: Determines if the Mobile Vary feature is enabled.

EnableCookieVary.description: Determines if the Cookie Vary feature is enabled.

CookieVaryParameters.description: Contains the list of vary parameters that will be used for vary cache by cookie string. If empty, cookie vary will not be used.

EnableHostnameVary.description: Determines if the Hostname Vary feature is enabled.

CnameDomain.description: The CNAME domain of the pull zone for setting up custom hostnames

AWSSigningEnabled.description: Determines if the AWS Signing is enabled

LoggingIPAnonymizationEnabled.description: Determines if the TLS 1 is enabled on the Pull Zone

EnableTLS1.description: Determines if the TLS 1 is enabled on the Pull Zone

EnableTLS1_1.description: Determines if the TLS 1.1 is enabled on the Pull Zone

VerifyOriginSSL.description: Determines if the Pull Zone should verify the origin SSL certificate

ErrorPageEnableCustomCode.description: Determines if custom error page code should be enabled.

ErrorPageCustomCode.description: Contains the custom error page code that will be returned

ErrorPageEnableStatuspageWidget.description: Determines if the statuspage widget should be displayed on the error pages

ErrorPageStatuspageCode.description: The statuspage code that will be used to build the status widget

ErrorPageWhitelabel.description: Determines if the error pages should be whitelabel or not

OriginShieldZoneCode.description: The zone code of the origin shield

LogForwardingEnabled.description: Determines if the log forawrding is enabled

LogForwardingProtocol.description: Determines the log forwarding protocol type

LoggingSaveToStorage.description: Determines if the permanent logging feature is enabled

LoggingStorageZoneId.description: The ID of the logging storage zone that is configured for this Pull Zone

FollowRedirects.description: Determines if the zone will follow origin redirects

VideoLibraryId.description: The ID of the video library that the zone is linked to

DnsRecordId.description: The ID of the DNS record tied to this pull zone

DnsZoneId.description: The ID of the DNS zone tied to this pull zone

DnsRecordValue.description: The cached version of the DNS record value

OptimizerEnabled.description: Determines if the optimizer should be enabled for this zone

OptimizerTunnelEnabled.description: Determines if the optimizer origin tunnel system is enabled for this zone

OptimizerDesktopMaxWidth.description: Determines the maximum automatic image size for desktop clients

OptimizerMinifyCSS.description: Determines if the CSS minifcation should be enabled

OptimizerWatermarkEnabled.description: Determines if image watermarking should be enabled

OriginRetries.description: The number of retries to the origin server

OriginConnectTimeout.description: The amount of seconds to wait when connecting to the origin. Otherwise the request will fail or retry.

OriginResponseTimeout.description: The amount of seconds to wait when waiting for the origin reply. Otherwise the request will fail or retry.

UseStaleWhileUpdating.description: Determines if we should use stale cache while cache is updating

UseStaleWhileOffline.description: Determines if we should use stale cache while the origin is offline

OriginRetry5XXResponses.description: Determines if we should retry the request in case of a 5XX response.

OriginShieldEnableConcurrencyLimit.description: Determines if the origin shield concurrency limit is enabled.

OriginShieldMaxConcurrentRequests.description: Determines the number of maximum concurrent requests allowed to the origin.

OriginShieldQueueMaxWaitTime.description: Determines the max queue wait time

OptimizerStaticHtmlWordPressBypassCookie.description: Wordpress cookie which should be bypassed by permacache in edge rule

UseBackgroundUpdate.description: Determines if cache update is performed in the background.

EnableAutoSSL.description: If set to true, any hostnames added to this Pull Zone will automatically enable SSL.

EnableQueryStringOrdering.description: If set to true the query string ordering property is enabled.

LogAnonymizationType.description: Gets the log anonymization type for this pull zone

OriginType.description: The type of the origin for this Pull Zone

EnableRequestCoalescing.description: Determines if request coalescing is currently enabled.

RequestCoalescingTimeout.description: Determines the lock time for coalesced requests.

OriginLinkValue.description: Returns the link short preview value for the pull zone origin connection.

DisableLetsEncrypt.description: If true, the built-in let's encrypt is disabled and requests are passed to the origin.

PreloadingScreenEnabled.description: Determines if the preloading screen is currently enabled

PreloadingScreenShowOnFirstVisit.description: Determines if the preloading screen is shown on the first load from a user.

PreloadingScreenCodeEnabled.description: Determines if the custom preloader screen is enabled

PreloadingScreenTheme.description: The currently configured preloading screem theme. (0 - Light, 1 - Dark)

PreloadingScreenDelay.description: The delay in miliseconds after which the preloading screen will be desplayed

EUUSDiscount.description: The Pull Zone specific pricing discount for EU and US region.

SouthAmericaDiscount.description: The Pull Zone specific pricing discount for South America region.

AfricaDiscount.description: The Pull Zone specific pricing discount for Africa region.

AsiaOceaniaDiscount.description: The Pull Zone specific pricing discount for Asia & Oceania region.

RoutingFilters.description: The list of routing filters enabled for this zone

BlockNoneReferrer.description: Determines if direct access to files will be blocked if not coming from allowed referrers

StickySessionType.description: Whether to use a Sticky Session mechanism for this pull zone

StickySessionClientHeaders.description: A set of comma-separated header names used to identify clients

UserId.description: User Id of the pull zone owner

OptimizerEnableUpscaling.description: Whether to automatically upscale assets when using Optimizer.

EnableWebSockets.description: Determines if WebSocket connections are allowed for this Pull Zone.

MaxWebSocketConnections.description: The maximum global simultaneous WebSocket connections allowed for this Pull Zone.

Name.description: The name of the optimizer class that will be used in the query string

Properties.description: The list of settings and values the class will send to the optimizer

Type.description: The type of the trigger. Url = 0, RequestHeader = 1, ResponseHeader = 2, UrlExtension = 3, CountryCode = 4, RemoteIP = 5, UrlQueryString = 6, RandomChance = 7

PatternMatches.description: The list of pattern matches that will trigger the edge rule

PatternMatchingType.description: The type of pattern matching. MatchAny = 0, MatchAll = 1, MatchNone = 2

Parameter1.description: The trigger parameter 1. The value depends on the type of trigger.

ConcurrentRequestsChart.description: The constructed chart of origin shield concurrent requests

QueuedRequestsChart.description: The constructed chart of origin shield requests chart

OriginUrl.description: Sets the origin URL of the Pull Zone

AllowedReferrers.description: Sets the list of referrer hostnames that are allowed to access the pull zone. Requests containing the header Referer: hostname that is not on the list will be rejected. If empty, all the referrers are allowed

BlockedReferrers.description: Sets the list of referrer hostnames that are blocked from accessing the pull zone.

BlockedIps.description: Sets the list of IPs that are blocked from accessing the pull zone. Requests coming from the following IPs will be rejected. If empty, all the IPs will be allowed

EnableGeoZoneUS.description: Determines if the delivery from the North America region should be enabled for this pull zone

EnableGeoZoneEU.description: Determines if the delivery from the Europe region should be enabled for this pull zone

EnableGeoZoneASIA.description: Determines if the delivery from the Asia / Oceania regions should be enabled for this pull zone

EnableGeoZoneSA.description: Determines if the delivery from the South America region should be enabled for this pull zone

EnableGeoZoneAF.description: Determines if the delivery from the Africa region should be enabled for this pull zone

BlockRootPathAccess.description: Determines if the zone should block requests to the root of the zone.

BlockPostRequests.description: Determines if the POST requests to this zone should be rejected.

EnableQueryStringOrdering.description: Determines if the query string ordering should be enabled.

EnableWebpVary.description: Determines if the WebP Vary feature should be enabled.

EnableAvifVary.description: Determines if the AVIF Vary feature should be enabled.

EnableMobileVary.description: Determines if the Mobile Vary feature is enabled.

EnableCountryCodeVary.description: Determines if the Country Code Vary feature should be enabled.

EnableCountryStateCodeVary.description: Determines if the Country State Code Vary feature should be enabled.

EnableHostnameVary.description: Determines if the Hostname Vary feature should be enabled.

EnableCacheSlice.description: Determines if cache slicing (Optimize for video) should be enabled for this zone

ZoneSecurityEnabled.description: Determines if the zone token authentication security should be enabled

ZoneSecurityIncludeHashRemoteIP.description: Determines if the token authentication IP validation should be enabled

IgnoreQueryStrings.description: Determines if the Pull Zone should ignore query strings when serving cached objects (Vary by Query String)

MonthlyBandwidthLimit.description: Sets the monthly limit of bandwidth in bytes that the pullzone is allowed to use

AccessControlOriginHeaderExtensions.description: Sets the list of extensions that will return the CORS headers

EnableAccessControlOriginHeader.description: Determines if CORS headers should be enabled

DisableCookies.description: Determines if the Pull Zone should automatically remove cookies from the responses

BudgetRedirectedCountries.description: Sets the list of two letter Alpha2 country codes that will be redirected to the cheapest possible region

BlockedCountries.description: Sets the list of two letter Alpha2 country codes that will be blocked from accessing the zone

CacheControlMaxAgeOverride.description: Sets the cache control override setting for this zone

CacheControlPublicMaxAgeOverride.description: Sets the browser cache control override setting for this zone

CacheControlBrowserMaxAgeOverride.description: (Deprecated) Sets the browser cache control override setting for this zone

AddHostHeader.description: Determines if the zone should forward the requested host header to the origin

AddCanonicalHeader.description: Determines if the canonical header should be added by this zone

EnableLogging.description: Determines if the logging should be enabled for this zone

LoggingIPAnonymizationEnabled.description: Determines if the log anonoymization should be enabled

PermaCacheStorageZoneId.description: The ID of the storage zone that should be used as the Perma-Cache

AWSSigningEnabled.description: Determines if the AWS signing should be enabled or not

AWSSigningRegionName.description: Sets the AWS signing region name

AWSSigningSecret.description: Sets the AWS signing secret key

EnableOriginShield.description: Determines if the origin shield should be enabled

OriginShieldZoneCode.description: Determines the zone code where the origin shield should be set up

EnableTLS1.description: Determines if the TLS 1 should be enabled on this zone

EnableTLS1_1.description: Determines if the TLS 1.1 should be enabled on this zone

CacheErrorResponses.description: Determines if the cache error responses should be enabled on the zone

VerifyOriginSSL.description: Determines if the SSL certificate should be verified when connecting to the origin

LogForwardingEnabled.description: Sets the log forwarding token for the zone

LogForwardingHostname.description: Sets the log forwarding destination hostname for the zone

LogForwardingPort.description: Sets the log forwarding port for the zone

LogForwardingToken.description: Sets the log forwarding token for the zone

LogForwardingProtocol.description: Sets the log forwarding protocol type

LoggingSaveToStorage.description: Determines if the logging permanent storage should be enabled

LoggingStorageZoneId.description: Sets the Storage Zone id that should contain the logs from this Pull Zone

FollowRedirects.description: Determines if the zone should follow redirects return by the oprigin and cache the response

ConnectionLimitPerIPCount.description: Determines the maximum number of connections per IP that will be allowed to connect to this Pull Zone

RequestLimit.description: Determines the maximum number of requests per second that will be allowed to connect to this Pull Zone

LimitRateAfter.description: Determines the amount of traffic transferred before the client is limited

LimitRatePerSecond.description: Determines the maximum number of requests per second coming from a single IP before it is blocked.

BurstSize.description: Determines the maximum burst requests before an IP is blocked

ErrorPageEnableCustomCode.description: Determines if custom error page code should be enabled.

ErrorPageCustomCode.description: Contains the custom error page code that will be returned

ErrorPageEnableStatuspageWidget.description: Determines if the statuspage widget should be displayed on the error pages

ErrorPageStatuspageCode.description: The statuspage code that will be used to build the status widget

ErrorPageWhitelabel.description: Determines if the error pages should be whitelabel or not

OptimizerEnabled.description: Determines if the optimizer should be enabled for this zone

OptimizerTunnelEnabled.description: Determines if the optimizer origin tunnel system should be enabled for this zone

OptimizerDesktopMaxWidth.description: Determines the maximum automatic image size for desktop clients

OptimizerMobileMaxWidth.description: Determines the maximum automatic image size for mobile clients

OptimizerImageQuality.description: Determines the image quality for desktop clients

OptimizerMobileImageQuality.description: Determines the image quality for mobile clients

OptimizerEnableWebP.description: Determines if the WebP optimization should be enabled

OptimizerPrerenderHtml.description: Determines if the SEO HTML prerender should be enabled

OptimizerEnableManipulationEngine.description: Determines the image manipulation should be enabled

OptimizerMinifyCSS.description: Determines if the CSS minifcation should be enabled

OptimizerMinifyJavaScript.description: Determines if the JavaScript minifcation should be enabled

OptimizerWatermarkEnabled.description: Determines if image watermarking should be enabled

OptimizerWatermarkUrl.description: Sets the URL of the watermark image

OptimizerWatermarkPosition.description: Sets the position of the watermark image

OptimizerWatermarkOffset.description: Sets the offset of the watermark image

OptimizerWatermarkMinImageSize.description: Sets the minimum image size to which the watermark will be added

OptimizerAutomaticOptimizationEnabled.description: Determines if the automatic image optimization should be enabled

OptimizerClasses.description: Determines the list of optimizer classes

OptimizerForceClasses.description: Determines if the optimizer classes should be forced

OptimizerStaticHtmlWordPressPath.description: Wordpress html path which should be bypassed by permacache in edge rule

OptimizerStaticHtmlWordPressBypassCookie.description: Wordpress cookie which should be bypassed by permacache in edge rule

Type.description: The type of the pull zone. Premium = 0, Volume = 1

OriginRetries.description: The number of retries to the origin server

OriginConnectTimeout.description: The amount of seconds to wait when connecting to the origin. Otherwise the request will fail or retry.

OriginResponseTimeout.description: The amount of seconds to wait when waiting for the origin reply. Otherwise the request will fail or retry.

UseStaleWhileUpdating.description: Determines if we should use stale cache while cache is updating

UseStaleWhileOffline.description: Determines if we should use stale cache while the origin is offline

OriginRetry5XXResponses.description: Determines if we should retry the request in case of a 5XX response.

OriginRetryConnectionTimeout.description: Determines if we should retry the request in case of a connection timeout.

OriginRetryResponseTimeout.description: Determines if we should retry the request in case of a response timeout.

OriginRetryDelay.description: Determines the amount of time that the CDN should wait before retrying an origin request.

DnsOriginPort.description: Determines the origin port of the pull zone.

DnsOriginScheme.description: Determines the origin scheme of the pull zone.

OriginShieldEnableConcurrencyLimit.description: Determines if the origin shield concurrency limit is enabled.

OriginShieldMaxConcurrentRequests.description: Determines the number of maximum concurrent requests allowed to the origin.

EnableCookieVary.description: Determines if the Cookie Vary feature is enabled.

OriginShieldQueueMaxWaitTime.description: Determines the max queue wait time

OriginShieldMaxQueuedRequests.description: Determines the max number of origin requests that will remain in the queue

UseBackgroundUpdate.description: Determines if cache update is performed in the background.

EnableAutoSSL.description: If set to true, any hostnames added to this Pull Zone will automatically enable SSL.

LogAnonymizationType.description: Sets the log anonymization type for this pull zone

StorageZoneId.description: The ID of the storage zone that will be used as the origin

EdgeScriptId.description: The ID of the edge script that will be used as the origin

MiddlewareScriptId.description: The ID of the middleware script

EdgeScriptExecutionPhase.description: The execution phase of the edge script

OriginType.description: Determine the type of the origin for this Pull Zone

OriginHostHeader.description: Sets the host header that will be sent to the origin

EnableRequestCoalescing.description: Determines if request coalescing is currently enabled.

RequestCoalescingTimeout.description: Determines the lock time for coalesced requests.

DisableLetsEncrypt.description: If set to true, the built-in let's encrypt will be disabled and requests are passed to the origin.

PreloadingScreenEnabled.description: Determines if the preloading screen is currently enabled

PreloadingScreenShowOnFirstVisit.description: Determines if the preloading screen is shown on the first load from a user.

PreloadingScreenTheme.description: The currently configured preloading screem theme. (0 - Light, 1 - Dark)

PreloadingScreenCodeEnabled.description: Determines if the custom preloader screen should be enabled

PreloadingScreenDelay.description: The delay in miliseconds after which the preloading screen will be displayed (0 - 10000ms)

RoutingFilters.description: The list of routing filters enabled for this zone

StickySessionType.description: Whether to use a Sticky Session mechanism for this pull zone

StickySessionClientHeaders.description: A set of comma-separated header names used to identify clients

OptimizerEnableUpscaling.description: Determines if Optimizer should automatically upscale images

EnableWebSockets.description: Determines if WebSocket connections are allowed for this Pull Zone.

Name.description: The name of the pull zone.

Guid.description: The unique GUID of the edge rule

ActionType.description: The action type of the edge rule

ActionParameter1.description: The Action parameter 1. The value depends on other parameters of the edge rule.

ActionParameter2.description: The Action parameter 2. The value depends on other parameters of the edge rule.

ActionParameter3.description: The Action parameter 3. The value depends on other parameters of the edge rule.

Triggers.description: The list of trigger that trigger the edge rule

Description.description: The description of the edge rule

Enabled.description: Determines if the edge rule is currently enabled or not

OrderIndex.description: The index of the edge rule in the list of execution priority

Hostname.description: The hostname that will be added as an allowed referer

AddAllowedReferrerRequestModel.description: The model used for adding new allowed referer hostnames

Id.description: The unique ID of the hostname

Value.description: The hostname value for the domain name

ForceSSL.description: Determines if the Force SSL feature is enabled

IsSystemHostname.description: Determines if this is a system hostname controlled by bunny.net

IsManagedHostname.description: Determines if this is a managed hostname controlled by bunny.net

HasCertificate.description: Determines if the hostname has an SSL certificate configured

Certificate.description: Contains the Base64Url encoded certificate for the hostname

CertificateKey.description: Contains the Base64Url encoded certificate key for the hostname

CertificateKeyType.description: The private key type to use for automatic certificates

Id.description: The ID of the billing record

PaymentId.description: The external ID of the payment

Amount.description: The amount linked to the record model

Payer.description: The payer reference that sent the payment

Timestamp.description: The date and time when the billing record was created

Type.description: The type of the billing record. PayPal = 0, Crypto = 1, CreditCard = 2, MonthlyUsage = 3, Refund = 4, CouponCode = 5, BankTransfer = 6, AffiliateCredits = 7

InvoiceAvailable.description: Determines if an invoice is available

DocumentDownloadUrl.description: The URL where the invoice or document can be downloaded. Null if this is not available.

DetailedDocumentDownloadUrl.description: The URL where the document with product usage breakdown can be downloaded. Null if this is not available.

Hostname.description: The hostname that will be removed as a blocked referer

RemoveBlockedReferrerRequestModel.description: The model used for removing new existing blocked referer hostnames

PullZoneOriginType.description:
0 = OriginUrl
1 = DnsAccelerate
2 = StorageZone
3 = LoadBalancer
4 = EdgeScript
5 = MagicContainers
6 = PushZone

Hostname.description: The hostname that will be removed as an allowed referer

RemoveAllowedReferrerRequestModel.description: The model used for removing new allowed referer hostnames

RequestsOptimizedChart.description: The constructed chart of optimized requests

AverageCompressionChart.description: Average compression chart of the responses

TrafficSavedChart.description: The constructed chart of saved traffic

AverageProcessingTimeChart.description: The constructed chart of saved traffic

TotalRequestsOptimized.description: The total number of optimized requests

AverageProcessingTime.description: The average processing time of each request

AverageCompressionRatio.description: The average compression ratio of CDN responses

Status.description: Determines if the Pull Zone is currently enabled, active and running

BlockedIp.description: The IP that will be blocked from accessing the pull zone

AddBlockedIpRequestModel.description: The model used for adding new blocked Ips

TotalOriginTraffic.description: The total amount of traffic received from the origin

OriginResponseTimeChart.description: The constructed origin response time chart data

TotalRequestsServed.description: The total requests served by the response in the given time range

CacheHitRate.description: The average cache hit rate in the response in the given time range

BandwidthUsedChart.description: The constructed bandwdidth used chart data

BandwidthCachedChart.description: The constructed cached bandwdidth used chart data

CacheHitRateChart.description: The constructed cache hit rate chart data

RequestsServedChart.description: The constructed requests served chart data

PullRequestsPulledChart.description: The constructed uncached requests served chart data

OriginShieldBandwidthUsedChart.description: The constructed origin shield bandwdidth used chart data

OriginShieldInternalBandwidthUsedChart.description: The constructed origin shield internal bandwdidth used chart data

OriginTrafficChart.description: The constructed origin traffic used chart data

UserBalanceHistoryChart.description: The constructed user balance history chart data

Error3xxChart.description: The constructed 3XX error responses chart data

Error4xxChart.description: The constructed 4XX error responses chart data

Error5xxChart.description: The constructed 5XX error responses chart data

EdgeRuleActionType.description:
0 = ForceSSL
1 = Redirect
2 = OriginUrl
3 = OverrideCacheTime
4 = BlockRequest
5 = SetResponseHeader
6 = SetRequestHeader
7 = ForceDownload
8 = DisableTokenAuthentication
9 = EnableTokenAuthentication
10 = OverrideCacheTimePublic
11 = IgnoreQueryString
12 = DisableOptimizer
13 = ForceCompression
14 = SetStatusCode
15 = BypassPermaCache
16 = OverrideBrowserCacheTime
17 = OriginStorage
18 = SetNetworkRateLimit
19 = SetConnectionLimit
20 = SetRequestsPerSecondLimit
21 = RunEdgeScript
22 = OriginMagicContainers
23 = DisableWAF
24 = RetryOrigin
25 = OverrideBrowserCacheResponseHeader
26 = RemoveBrowserCacheResponseHeader
27 = DisableShieldChallenge
28 = DisableShield
29 = DisableShieldBotDetection
30 = BypassAwsS3Authentication
31 = DisableShieldAccessLists
32 = DisableShieldRateLimiting

DnsRecordTypes.description:
0 = A
1 = AAAA
2 = CNAME
3 = TXT
4 = MX
5 = Redirect
6 = Flatten
7 = PullZone
8 = SRV
9 = CAA
10 = PTR
11 = Script
12 = NS

Id.description: The ID of the storage zone

UserId.description: The ID of the user that owns the storage zone

Name.description: The name of the storage zone

Password.description: The API access key or FTP password

DateModified.description: The date when the zone was last modified

Deleted.description: Determines if the zone was deleted or not

StorageUsed.description: The total amount of storage used by this zone

FilesStored.description: The total number of files stored by this zone

Region.description: The main region used by the storage zone

ReplicationRegions.description: The replication regions enabled for this storage zone

PullZones.description: The list of pull zones connected to this storage zone

ReadOnlyPassword.description: The read-only API access key or FTP password

Rewrite404To200.description: Determines if the storage zone will rewrite 404 status codes to 200 status codes

Custom404FilePath.description: The custom 404 error path that will be returned in case of a missing file.

StorageHostname.description: Determines the storage hostname for this zone

ZoneTier.description: Determines the storage zone tier that is storing the data

ReplicationChangeInProgress.description: Determines if the storage zone is currently enabling a new replication region

PriceOverride.description: The custom price override for this zone. Unit is $/TB/month.

Discount.description: The Storage Zone specific pricing discount.

StorageZoneType.description: The Storage Zone S3 support type
